column4: hey everyone... I dunno where else to ask this, but for some reason google.com started defaulting to google.de (when it should be .ca) for all the computers in my house.  Anyone have any idea why or how I can fix this?
are you using a proxy that routes your internet connection through Germany?
no, no proxy.  and if I traceroute to google.com I see it goes through montreal, new york, qwest, some random routers, then google... nothing out of the ordinary
hm, sometimes when using Tor I have that problem, but that's because tor routes things through random countries :)
